text: So I would say my style is pretty simple. I love a monochromatic look. My house is kind of traditional, but my style is modern, so I kind of like meet it in the middle. I like things just to be zen and calm and welcoming and inviting, and I would say my goals are just to declutter things, make things have meaning. I don't like to have things that just are for decoration. I have artwork to fill the walls because walls need to be filled with space, but I'm not someone who has a lot of clutter on counters and just knickknacks for the sake of it being on the counter. So I often have people say, your house looks like it's show ready to be sold. So I take that as a big compliment. I like things very simple and streamlined and minimalistic, and I'd say that's probably my style.
